Campaign Source Notes

Campaign Structure

This wiki was seeded from Shared Notetaking Doc 2.0 (session notes through Session 23).

Use this page as the provenance reference for session summaries and extracted entities.

Scope

  • Campaign arcs include Billowbarrow/Califia material and later Vallaki/Barovia threads.
  • Session pages are structured summaries, not verbatim transcript copies.
